name: Virtual Therapeutic Rabbit Pet
description:
This is the best rabbit app.
- You can grow a rabbit.
- You can know growth of rabbit in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed rabbit once every four days, and clean up only once a week.
Rabbit is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of rabbit in your daily life!
